titles.title: CB 193 With the Name of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WITH THE NAME OF JESUS,
With the name of Jesus,
With the name of Jesus on our side,
Nothing can defeat us,
By His Word He keeps us,
With the name of Jesus on our side.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With the blood of Jesus
With the blood of Jesus
With the blood of Jesus on our side,
Nothing can defeat us,
By His Word He keeps us,
With the blood of Jesus on our side.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With the love of Jesus
With the love of Jesus
With the love of Jesus on our side,
Nothing can defeat us,
By His Word He keeps us,
With the love of Jesus on our side.
